llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Great! Based on your preferences, I have created a 3-day travel plan for two people from West Palm Beach to White Plains, visiting only one city from March 5th to March 7th, 2022. Here's the plan:

Day 1 (March 5th):

* Depart from West Palm Beach in the morning and take a flight to White Plains (flight duration: 3 hours 25 minutes, flight number: F375565)
* Arrive at White Plains Airport in the afternoon and check into your hotel (Hotel name: The Gilded Otter)
* Have dinner at one of the local Mexican restaurants (restaurant name: El Rancho)

Day 2 (March 6th):

* Start the day with breakfast at the hotel's restaurant (restaurant name: The Breakfast Club)
* Visit the nearby Westchester County Government Center for some government work (address: 147 East Fordham Road, White Plains, NY 10601)
* Have lunch at a nearby Chinese restaurant (restaurant name: Happy Wok)
* In the evening, head to the nearby city of New Rochelle and have dinner at one of the local Mediterranean restaurants (restaurant name: La Strada Ristorante)

Day 3 (March 7th):

* Have breakfast at the hotel's restaurant (restaurant name: The Breakfast Club)
* Visit the nearby White Plains Library for some reading and research (address: 100 Main Street, White Plains, NY 10601)
* Head back to West Palm Beach in the afternoon on a flight (flight duration: 3 hours 45 minutes, flight number: F3759006)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $1,100 (2 flights @ $550 each)
* Hotel: $800 (2 nights @ $400 each)
* Food and drinks: $700 (3 days x $233 each)
Total budget: $2,600

Note: Prices are estimates and may vary based on current prices and availability. Also, please check with the airlines for the latest flight schedules and fares.

I hope you enjoy your trip! Let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.
